features.headline: Edit Markdown, Visually
features.text: Tina is an open-source, headless CMS for Markdown, MDX, and JSON.

features.headline: Own Your Content
features.text: Store content in your repo. Tina saves to MDX, Markdown, and JSON and provides a powerful data layer on top of your static files.

features.headline: Simple CMS Configuration
features.text: Define your content's schema and Tina will provide you with a user friendly editing experience.

features.headline: Powered by Git
features.text: Let your editorial team focus on writing content, while Tina commits to your repository.

items.headline: Visual Editing
items.text: See content changes in real-time as you edit.

items.headline: Static and Dynamic
items.text: Query your Markdown content like you would with a headless CMS. Tina’s GraphQL Data Layer supports filtering, sorting, pagination, and more.

items.headline: Develop Locally
items.text: Run Tina locally and talk to your local filesystem.

items.headline: 3rd-party Media
items.text: Store Media assets in your repo or connect to S3, Cloudinary, etc.

items.headline: Composable Blocks
items.text: Create reusable components that you can edit with Tina. Let your team assemble pages like a site-builder.

items.headline: Markdown at Scale
items.text: Tina powers sites with 10’s of thousands of pages with great performance and without GitHub rate-limiting.
